describeContents().Description: Describe the kinds of special objects contained in this Parcelable instance's marshaled representation. For example, if the object will include a file descriptor in the output of @B_android#os#Parcelable#writeToParcel_E@, the return value of this method must include the @B_android#os#Parcelable#CONTENTS_FILE_DESCRIPTOR_E@ bit.

Returns: The bit mask of change types. One or more of: CONTENT_CHANGE_TYPE_CONTENT_DESCRIPTION CONTENT_CHANGE_TYPE_SUBTREE CONTENT_CHANGE_TYPE_TEXT CONTENT_CHANGE_TYPE_PANE_TITLE CONTENT_CHANGE_TYPE_UNDEFINED CONTENT_CHANGE_TYPE_PANE_APPEARED CONTENT_CHANGE_TYPE_PANE_DISAPPEARED Value is either 0 or a combination of @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#CONTENT_CHANGE_TYPE_UNDEFINED_E@, @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#CONTENT_CHANGE_TYPE_SUBTREE_E@, @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#CONTENT_CHANGE_TYPE_TEXT_E@, @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#CONTENT_CHANGE_TYPE_CONTENT_DESCRIPTION_E@, @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#CONTENT_CHANGE_TYPE_PANE_TITLE_E@, @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#CONTENT_CHANGE_TYPE_PANE_APPEARED_E@, and @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#CONTENT_CHANGE_TYPE_PANE_DISAPPEARED_E@
getContentChangeTypes().Description: Gets the bit mask of change types signaled by a @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#TYPE_WINDOW_CONTENT_CHANGED_E@ event or @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#TYPE_WINDOW_STATE_CHANGED_E@. A single event may represent multiple change types.

toString().Description: Returns a string representation of the object. In general, the toString method returns a string that "textually represents" this object. The result should be a concise but informative representation that is easy for a person to read. It is recommended that all subclasses override this method. The toString method for class Object returns a string consisting of the name of the class of which the object is an instance, the at-sign character `@', and the unsigned hexadecimal representation of the hash code of the object. In other words, this method returns a string equal to the value of:

ClassDesc: This class represents accessibility events that are sent by the system when something notable happens in the user interface. For example, when a @B_android#widget#Button_E@ is clicked, a @B_android#view#View_E@ is focused, etc. An accessibility event is fired by an individual view which populates the event with data for its state and requests from its parent to send the event to interested parties. The parent can optionally modify or even block the event based on its broader understanding of the user interface's context. The main purpose of an accessibility event is to communicate changes in the UI to an @B_android#accessibilityservice#AccessibilityService_E@. The service may then inspect, if needed the user interface by examining the View hierarchy, as represented by a tree of @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityNodeInfo_E@s (snapshot of a View state) which can be used for exploring the window content. Note that the privilege for accessing an event's source, thus the window content, has to be explicitly requested. For more details refer to @B_android#accessibilityservice#AccessibilityService_E@. If an accessibility service has not requested to retrieve the window content the event will not contain reference to its source. Also for events of type @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#TYPE_NOTIFICATION_STATE_CHANGED_E@ the source is never available. This class represents various semantically different accessibility event types. Each event type has an associated set of related properties. In other words, each event type is characterized via a subset of the properties exposed by this class. For each event type there is a corresponding constant defined in this class. Follows a specification of the event types and their associated properties: @B_android#view#View_E@ like @B_android#widget#Button_E@, @B_android#widget#CompoundButton_E@, etc. Type:@B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#TYPE_VIEW_CLICKED_E@ Properties: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventType_E@ - The type of the event. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getSource_E@ - The source info (for registered clients). @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getClassName_E@ - The class name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getPackageName_E@ - The package name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventTime_E@ - The event time. @B_android#view#View_E@ like @B_android#widget#Button_E@, @B_android#widget#CompoundButton_E@, etc Type:@B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#TYPE_VIEW_LONG_CLICKED_E@ Properties: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventType_E@ - The type of the event. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getSource_E@ - The source info (for registered clients). @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getClassName_E@ - The class name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getPackageName_E@ - The package name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventTime_E@ - The event time. @B_android#widget#AdapterView_E@. Type: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#TYPE_VIEW_SELECTED_E@ Properties: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventType_E@ - The type of the event. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getSource_E@ - The source info (for registered clients). @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getClassName_E@ - The class name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getPackageName_E@ - The package name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventTime_E@ - The event time. @B_android#view#View_E@. Type: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#TYPE_VIEW_FOCUSED_E@ Properties: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventType_E@ - The type of the event. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getSource_E@ - The source info (for registered clients). @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getClassName_E@ - The class name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getPackageName_E@ - The package name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventTime_E@ - The event time. @B_android#widget#EditText_E@. Type: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#TYPE_VIEW_TEXT_CHANGED_E@ Properties: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventType_E@ - The type of the event. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getSource_E@ - The source info (for registered clients). @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getClassName_E@ - The class name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getPackageName_E@ - The package name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventTime_E@ - The event time. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getText_E@ - The new text of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getBeforeText_E@ - The text of the source before the change. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getFromIndex_E@ - The text change start index. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getAddedCount_E@ - The number of added characters. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getRemovedCount_E@ - The number of removed characters. @B_android#widget#EditText_E@. Type: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#TYPE_VIEW_TEXT_SELECTION_CHANGED_E@ Properties: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventType_E@ - The type of the event. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getSource_E@ - The source info (for registered clients). @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getClassName_E@ - The class name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getPackageName_E@ - The package name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventTime_E@ - The event time. Type: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#TYPE_VIEW_TEXT_TRAVERSED_AT_MOVEMENT_GRANULARITY_E@ Properties: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventType_E@ - The type of the event. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getSource_E@ - The source info (for registered clients). @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getClassName_E@ - The class name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getPackageName_E@ - The package name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventTime_E@ - The event time. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getMovementGranularity_E@ - Sets the granularity at which a view's text was traversed. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getText_E@ - The text of the source's sub-tree. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getFromIndex_E@ - The start the text that was skipped over in this movement. This is the starting point when moving forward through the text, but not when moving back. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getToIndex_E@ - The end of the text that was skipped over in this movement. This is the ending point when moving forward through the text, but not when moving back. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getAction_E@ - Gets traversal action which specifies the direction. Type: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#TYPE_VIEW_SCROLLED_E@ Properties: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventType_E@ - The type of the event. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getSource_E@ - The source info (for registered clients). @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getClassName_E@ - The class name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getPackageName_E@ - The package name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventTime_E@ - The event time. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getScrollDeltaX_E@ - The difference in the horizontal position. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getScrollDeltaY_E@ - The difference in the vertical position. @B_android#view#View#setAccessibilityPaneTitle_E@. Not that changes to true windows are represented by @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#TYPE_WINDOWS_CHANGED_E@. Type: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#TYPE_WINDOW_STATE_CHANGED_E@ Properties: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventType_E@ - The type of the event. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getContentChangeTypes_E@ - The type of state changes. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getSource_E@ - The source info (for registered clients). @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getClassName_E@ - The class name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getPackageName_E@ - The package name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventTime_E@ - The event time. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getText_E@ - The text of the source's sub-tree, including the pane titles. Type: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#TYPE_WINDOW_CONTENT_CHANGED_E@ Properties: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventType_E@ - The type of the event. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getContentChangeTypes_E@ - The type of content changes. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getSource_E@ - The source info (for registered clients). @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getClassName_E@ - The class name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getPackageName_E@ - The package name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventTime_E@ - The event time. @B_android#accessibilityservice#AccessibilityService#getWindows_E@. For regions of the user interface that are presented as windows but are controlled by an app's process, use @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#TYPE_WINDOW_STATE_CHANGED_E@. Type: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#TYPE_WINDOWS_CHANGED_E@ Properties: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventType_E@ - The type of the event. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventTime_E@ - The event time. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getWindowChanges_E@ - The specific change to the source window Note: You can retrieve the @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityWindowInfo_E@ for the window source of the event by looking through the list returned by @B_android#accessibilityservice#AccessibilityService#getWindows_E@ for the window whose ID matches @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getWindowId_E@. @B_android#app#Notification_E@ or @B_android#widget#Toast_E@. Type: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#TYPE_NOTIFICATION_STATE_CHANGED_E@ Properties: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventType_E@ - The type of the event. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getClassName_E@ - The class name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getPackageName_E@ - The package name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventTime_E@ - The event time. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getParcelableData_E@ - The posted @B_android#app#Notification_E@, if applicable. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getText_E@ - Displayed text of the @B_android#widget#Toast_E@, if applicable, or may contain text from the @B_android#app#Notification_E@, although @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getParcelableData_E@ is a richer set of data for @B_android#app#Notification_E@. @B_android#view#View_E@. The hover may be generated via exploring the screen by touch or via a pointing device. Type: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#TYPE_VIEW_HOVER_ENTER_E@ Properties: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventType_E@ - The type of the event. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getSource_E@ - The source info (for registered clients). @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getClassName_E@ - The class name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getPackageName_E@ - The package name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventTime_E@ - The event time. @B_android#view#View_E@. The hover may be generated via exploring the screen by touch or via a pointing device. Type: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#TYPE_VIEW_HOVER_EXIT_E@ Properties: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventType_E@ - The type of the event. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getSource_E@ - The source info (for registered clients). @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getClassName_E@ - The class name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getPackageName_E@ - The package name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventTime_E@ - The event time. Type: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#TYPE_TOUCH_INTERACTION_START_E@ Properties: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventType_E@ - The type of the event. Note: This event is fired only by the system and is not passed to the view tree to be populated. Type: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#TYPE_TOUCH_INTERACTION_END_E@ Properties: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventType_E@ - The type of the event. Note: This event is fired only by the system and is not passed to the view tree to be populated. Type: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#TYPE_TOUCH_EXPLORATION_GESTURE_START_E@ Properties: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventType_E@ - The type of the event. Note: This event is fired only by the system and is not passed to the view tree to be populated. Type: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#TYPE_TOUCH_EXPLORATION_GESTURE_END_E@ Properties: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventType_E@ - The type of the event. Note: This event is fired only by the system and is not passed to the view tree to be populated. Type: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#TYPE_GESTURE_DETECTION_START_E@ Properties: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventType_E@ - The type of the event. Note: This event is fired only by the system and is not passed to the view tree to be populated. Type: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#TYPE_GESTURE_DETECTION_END_E@ Properties: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventType_E@ - The type of the event. Note: This event is fired only by the system and is not passed to the view tree to be populated. Type: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#TYPE_ANNOUNCEMENT_E@ Properties: @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventType_E@ - The type of the event. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getSource_E@ - The source info (for registered clients). @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getClassName_E@ - The class name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getPackageName_E@ - The package name of the source. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityEvent#getEventTime_E@ - The event time. @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityRecord#getText_E@ - The text of the announcement.
